name: Apes Fighting
description:
Apes Fighting gives you the ultimate adventure in the ape city. Angry apes have gone crazy in need for a survival. With an exciting war game play of apes and thrilling adventures, this action game “Apes Fighting” is an epic play

Features
1. Rich Graphics
2. Amazing sound effects
3. Crazy escape missions
4. Interesting Game play
5. Thrill of Playing the Role of an angry ape
6. Amazing 3D Jungle Environment
